Izumi; retrieved 2012-7-6. == Career == After graduating from high school in Japan, he joined Albirex Niigata FC (Singapore) of Singapore's S.League.Mandrekar, Kabir. "Japanese mother, Gujarati father, Pune wife, Indian football," The Indian Express, December, 26 2010; retrieved 2012-7-6. He played in Japan Football League for one season; and then he began playing in India.
